Description.Text: Location This aparthotel is located in a luxury complex in Port de Pollença, only 50 m from the beach. Facilities The establishment was renovated in 2011. Guests of the establishment are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. A lift can be used to access the upper floors. Services such as a cloakroom and currency exchange facilities make for a comfortable stay. Internet access and wireless internet access (no extra charge) are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a dining area, a café and a bar. Guests can visit the supermarket to purchase daily necessities. Shopping facilities are available. The grounds of the establishment feature a playground and an attractive garden. Additional features of the establishment include a TV room and a playroom. Guests arriving in their own vehicles can park in the car park. Guests can also use the bicycle storage facilities. Among the additional services available are car hire, medical assistance, a wake-up service and a laundry. A shuttle service is offered. Active guests can make use of the bicycle hire service to explore the surrounding area (for a fee). Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning, central heating, a living room, a kitchen and a bathroom. Most rooms feature a balcony or terrace. Each accommodation unit features a double bed or a sofa-bed. A safe is also available. A kitchenette equipped with a fridge and a microwave can be found in each accommodation unit. Convenient features include a telephone and a TV. In the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment A refreshing dip in the indoor or outdoor pool can be pleasantly cooling on hot days. A waterslide provides fun for all ages. A terrace, a sun terrace, sun loungers and parasols are available. A hot tub (for a fee) provides an opportunity for relaxation. Various refreshing drinks are available from the poolside bar. Table tennis and pool/billiards are some of the sports and leisure options available at the establishment. The establishment offers various wellness options, including a spa, a hammam, hydrotherapy and a solarium, or for a fee, a sauna, a steam bath and massage treatments. Other options and services include an entertainment programme, an entertainment programme for adults, an entertainment programme for children, a disco and a kids' club. Meals The establishment offers a wide range of bookable meals and board options, including breakfast, lunch, dinner, B & B, half board, full board and All-inclusive. Staff are also happy to prepare special dietary cuisine. Drinks are included for guests. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the establishment: VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard.
